name: Multigrain Pancakes
author: 9KATIE9
summary: Easy, satisfying, and full of whole grain goodness! Top as desired- I like mine with peanut butter and sugar-free syrup. Also, any chopped fruit, nuts, or chocolate chips could be added to the batter.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (e.g., Splenda ®)
directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, oats, cornmeal, sweetener, salt, baking powder, baking soda and cinnamon
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, yogurt, milk and water
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry, and mix just until moistened
Heat a skillet over medium heat, and coat with cooking spray
Pour about 1/3 cup of batter per pancake onto the skillet
Cook until bubbles begin to form in the center, then flip and cook until browned on the other side
